articles.title: NBC In Advanced Talks With NBA On $2.5B Per Season Media Rights Deal
articles.description:
Comcast's NBCUniversal is prepared to pay an average of about $2.5 billion per season to air a package of NBA games.
Warner Bros. Discovery, parent company of TNT, has paid an average fee of $1.2 billion per season under its current deal. WBD has the right to…
articles.content:

articles.author: Jacob Gallagher
articles.title: It’s Not a Sneaker. It’s Not a Loafer. It’s a ‘Snoafer.’
articles.description: New Balance’s 1906L isn’t coming out until August, but it’s already been memed into oblivion
articles.content:
Its the footwear equivalent of a spork. And no one knows what to make of it. 
New Balances latest frankenshoe, the 1906L, is trapped between a sneaker and a loafer. It has grayed-out mesh paneling a… [+290 chars]

articles.title: Caitlin Clark's Nike Deal Worth $28M Over Eight Years
articles.description:
Caitlin Clark's new deal with Nike is worth up to $28 million over eight years, sources tell the Wall Street Journal. 
Nike's original deal with Clark was signed in 2022 and was set to expire at the end of the 23-24 college basketball season.

articles.author: Carol Ryan
articles.title: America’s Cigarette Market Is Up for Grabs
articles.description: Philip Morris will soon be able to sell its most successful smoke-free product in the U.S., setting up a battle with its former parent company Altria.
articles.content:
Americas original Marlboro Man faces a fresh competitor, who also happens to be a Marlboro Man. The showdown between them will reshape the U.S. tobacco market.
